website_summaries.verdict: Office for Mac 2008 may be the best pick for business users, but most people can get by with less costly alternatives.
pros: Microsoft Office for Mac 2008 offers good looks that encompass deeper features than other Mac productivity software
business users get full Word mail merge, robust Excel spreadsheets, and better tools in Entourage
amateur desktop publishing features more polished documents
cons: Microsoft Office for Mac 2008 is pricey
saves work in new file formats by default
features don't match the depth of those in Office 2007 for Windows

customer_reviews.title: Not quite like Office for Windows, but pretty good
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't have the ribbon bar like the Windows versions do, but it's pretty good. I really just needed this for Excel on a Mac, but it was nice that it included Word and PowerPoint. This was the cheapest, fairly modern Office product I could find for Mac. Overall, a good buy. Only other complaint is that 64-bit versions of Office weren't available until 2010/2011, I think, so if you're doing large Excel computations that require a lot of memory resources, you might need to go with a later, 64-bit edition of Office for Mac.
customer_reviews.author: Joy77Division

customer_reviews.title: works great with OSX Lion
customer_reviews.text: Based on other website comments, I was concerned that this product would not work on my recently purchased (June 2012) MacBook Pro with OSX Lion. The cost difference between 2008 and the most recent 2011 is substantial, so I decided to take a risk. I have used Word and Excel regularly, and have had no problems. I have opened a powerpoint presentation and made a change once, but had no problems with that either. Highly recommend this to those who just shelled out $1200 for a new laptop, but don't want to fork over another $100 for Office.
customer_reviews.author: alj5

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, it's so nice to have an Office:mac package on my computer again! This is a slightly older version, but it works, and it doesn't tell you right off, but it does not get Registered with Microsoft. I finally found a place where it actually said that THIS version does not require Registration. In fact, you can't register it. BUT, it works great!!!
customer_reviews.author: E.D.

customer_reviews.title: prefer this to the upgraded versions
customer_reviews.text: I know this is 2008 version, but I hated the upgraded version because they changed the palates, and some of the functions (especially in excel) and I didn't want to learn how to use it, where my favorite tools were, etc. Why do they make such huge changes in software upgrades? I know some people like it, but I'm too busy to keep learning how to use the same software I've been using for years.
customer_reviews.author: Ginabobeeena

customer_reviews.title: Microsoft Office 2008
customer_reviews.text: Got this to be able to use Word when I installed my i-Mac's operating system from Leopard to Lion... Old versions of Word for Mac were incompatible. Read all the reviews, crossed my fingers, the system and Word run great together and no problems installing it. I wanted a package that had Entourage for email and this particular one had it. It was a great price and I felt if it didn't work I'd only be out the cost of a great dinner. So far so good. I went for it and I'm a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Better than 2011 version because . . .
customer_reviews.text: it still has Entourage which allows you to define Projects - and link all files to each project: emails, tasks, every file you want to. And if you need to subdivide projects, you can use the categories feature. Both of these, unlike the PC version, are pretty limitless. And - it still has drop down menus instead of the unintuitive "ribbon". Very fast adaptation from 2004 or any other version. I'll keep using this until it doesn't work any more!
customer_reviews.author: Noele J. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Regrettable reversion
customer_reviews.text: Regrettably Microsoft removed a number of critical functions from Office 2011 for Mac. Without knowing that features such as the Add Menu had been removed, i had purchased 2011, but its loss of functional value, slow loading and saving of files, and cluncky interface led me to revert to Office 2008. One can only hope that Microsoft will see the error of its ways and restore features that are essential to those of us who use Office for real actual work.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: OK as a less expensive substitute for expensive "latest" version
customer_reviews.text: Has worked well on my 2012 Mac through the present (Oct 2014), though I only use Word and Excel. I wanted a less expensive version than the latest-and-greatest current version, and this 2008 has been a completely suitable substitute for my modest purposes. It eased my transition from Windows to MAC, allowing me to keep Win-based files when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: A truly great bargain. it works on the IMAC OS X Mavericks. It fit my needs for a 300+ page publication and have had absolutely no problems with it whatsoever. I transferred the large PC WORD document into it from an external hard drive and I was able to continue working on it when I got the new MAC. Great!
customer_reviews.author: Henrietta H.

customer_reviews.title: Runs Virtual MS Windows Pro 7 on my Macbook Pro with Yosemite OS X.
customer_reviews.text: Runs Virtual MS Windows Pro 7 on my Macbook Pro with Yosemite OS X. Highly recommended. Save some money and buy Microsoft Office 2008 for Mac Special Media Edition [Old Version] save yourself a few hundred dollars instead of newer versions of MS Windows.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: MS Office is over priced
customer_reviews.text: MSW Office is over-priced. Operations conflict with everything else and try to take over all computer software ops. I am seriously considering dumping all MS apps and going to the apple suite for simplicity and performance. Software is not backward or forward compatible. It does not play well with others.They all fight each other. MS products are very vulnerable to bugs and viruses, and you get the chance to spend more money on more software to remedy their problems and design weaknesses. I will do all I can to avoid future MS product purchases, anywhere. You delivered the product in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory S. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Mac
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't afford to pay for the latest, but the version I had didn't transfer to the new OS upgrade 2 years ago, and I finally found the 2008 still available brand new. It does everything I wanted, and makes my life so much easier! Great vendor who had it for sale, too.
customer_reviews.author: Dezertsuz

customer_reviews.title: Very Slow to load.
customer_reviews.text: I was not thrilled with this version of Office but for the price I can live with it. It is very slow to launch and the interface is not the greatest but it was all I could afford at the time and it does work fine once it loads. It even opens docx documents which surprised me. Got it quick with no issues so that is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Alesia Y. Merris

customer_reviews.title: Does The Trick
customer_reviews.text: Its not the most recent, but it does what I need it to do. I just need to be able to write and edit documents. I really just wanted to be able to update and keep my resume stored. Its very familiar with what I use at work so I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: DunDee910

customer_reviews.title: Great if you don't need the latest/greatest
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife's MacBook. She is a casual/home user and needed more than "Pages" but didn't need the latest Office. It installed without any problems and she loves it. Great way to save some $$ if you don't care that it's a few years old.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: wife uses it all the time on her work laptop
customer_reviews.author: J. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: glad there's a MAC version of MS OFFICE
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly what I needed to get my work done. Purchased a Macbook after years of PC use and needed help on some projects... glad there's a MAC version of MS OFFICE.
customer_reviews.author: N. Coven

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, not instructions needed if you are familiar with microsoft products.
customer_reviews.author: saxant

customer_reviews.title: Excellent productivity application for the Mac
customer_reviews.text: As a Macintosh user for over 25 years i have very little care for Microsoft's Windows products and applications. However, this Office 2008 version for the Mac is excellent. A far improvement from previous productivity applications, even a good competitor to Apple's iWorks application bundle, given the bargain price I paid for Office. Kudos to Amazon's affiliates and partners for its speed delivery and processing.
customer_reviews.author: John H. Stinson Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: I only needed the basics
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived on time and was exactly as described. 1/2 the price of newest version
customer_reviews.author: VictoryTC

customer_reviews.title: ... with Mavericks and my Mac Book Pro and works fine.
customer_reviews.text: Used it with Mavericks and my Mac Book Pro and works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Brand new and no problems with it. Glad I have the old school version again!
customer_reviews.author: Nataly

customer_reviews.title: I'm now compatible with office standards
customer_reviews.text: Received the order fast and it works on snow leppord! Installed on my MacBook pro in a matter of minutes. Packaging was like new. Microsoft Office '08 rocks and is faster than the new version on my older system. I use expression media daily, since I am a photography hobbiest. Well worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Bisforblake

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was not so sure this was going to work out, but it has been terrific! THANKS for your excellent service!
customer_reviews.author: Richardinhingham

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: good price. Came in handy for school work and what not. Loved that It came with enough for all our computers,
customer_reviews.author: mona

customer_reviews.title: okay
customer_reviews.text: We used MS office on our PC for years but wanted to use it on our Mac, too. We are still learning how to shift our PC knowledge over to the Mac. I will review again in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: mmartha

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It crashes or "stop responding" more than the windows versions but all in all does it's job.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Cant beat it for the price!
customer_reviews.text: If you want a legal full version of Office (same as student edition) for cheap, this is it! I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Rex

customer_reviews.title: Good spreadsheet software
customer_reviews.text: I do not need the most advanced feature. This is good enough for me. However, it does not accept Chinese fonts well.
customer_reviews.author: RingAbell

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: For the teachers that think there is a difference in the Pages saved as docx this has saved me. Great app.
customer_reviews.author: Apple User

customer_reviews.title: not the person to ask?
customer_reviews.text: just got this older microsoft office 2008 because i still use a power mac and an intel:) seems to have loaded just fine on both and for my small usage of this type of program works fine:)
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Frankie D. Messer

customer_reviews.title: Outdated Software Saved Me Tons Of Money
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this package, saved me so much money. Easy to install on my MacBook Pro. Everything works.
customer_reviews.author: c.deckinga

customer_reviews.title: Microsoft Office Review
customer_reviews.text: This was an amazing price and, though it is a little older, is a great product that gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: xthao

customer_reviews.title: Microsoft Office
customer_reviews.text: It works beautifully, I was able to download it on all three of my macs and it is simply great. This version is just as good as the newest Microsoft office but cheaper. Great for work and school.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Microsoft Office 2008 for Mac Special Media Edition [Old Version]
customer_reviews.text: I have an older Mac, and I don't need to get a new one as it does everything I want or need to do. This product allows me to view items that I could not read in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J. Kornfeld

customer_reviews.title: Great interaction for my windows applications needs on my Mac
customer_reviews.text: Great interaction for my windows applications needs on my Mac. This product does exactly what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: RaeO

customer_reviews.title: Microsoft Office 2008 for the Mac
customer_reviews.text: This version of Microsoft Office 2008 for the Macintosh offers all the necessary features in the upgraded format, but at a much lower cost than the 2011 version. This version is an ideal purchase for the student on a thrifty budget.
customer_reviews.author: Bradjp

customer_reviews.title: Office 2008 for the MAC!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Now my wife can correspond with her PC friends using a compatible program for email and the like. Although personally I prefer the PC, for her she loves her MAC. Of course she could email her PC friends without Office for MAC, but she was inhibited from enjoying the several features she can now access with Office 2008 for MAC.
customer_reviews.author: E. Oxner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Well-packaged, and very prompt! Product in excellent condition! Valuable software! Very clear directions! Very easy to install. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: john griffin

customer_reviews.title: I does what I need
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of Open Office Org because I get so much Micro-Shaft Operating System documents. After I messed up and sent a reume whos format was terrible I switched to this product. (Not Again) it also cost me the development contract. I highly recommend this line of products if your audience is Micro-Shaft.
customer_reviews.author: Shop

customer_reviews.title: Microsoft Office 2008 for Mac
customer_reviews.text: Is working seamlessly with OS 10.6. The media features are handy for a user like me, who needs some graphics, but isn't knowledgeable with applications like adobe suite, pagemaker, etc.
customer_reviews.author: A.K. Rote

customer_reviews.title: Everything I needed
customer_reviews.text: Simple to install on my MacBook and came pretty quickly in the mail. I needed it for school and it had everything I needed.
customer_reviews.author: KrysBelk

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Everything worked perfectly, it was exactly how it was described and it came very quickly. I would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Puentes

customer_reviews.title: Office for MAC
customer_reviews.text: Overall everything works well. Except for Entourage wich has major problems working with an Exchange Server. If you use Exchange Server, use a PC and Outlook.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Driggers

product_meta.title: Microsoft Office 2008 for Mac Special Media Edition [Old Version]
product_meta.description:
For media-savvy Mac users to achieve more & simplify digital asset management. For professionals working with libraries of images, video, music, and digital assets, we’ve combined the reinvented Office 2008 for Mac experience with Expression Media. Includes: Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Entourage, Microsoft Server Exchange Support, Automator Actions for Workflows in Microsoft Office, Microsoft Expression Media (formerly iView).

AMAZON.COM
Microsoft Office 2008 for Mac Special Media Edition. The power of the Office 2008 applications plus Expression Media, the powerful asset management tool to visually catalog, organize and present all of your digital assets. Simplify your work and visualize your success.

Five Great Reasons to Upgrade to Office 2008 Special Media Edition: Universal Binary Support: Office 2008 Special Media Edition runs natively on both Intel- and PowerPC-based Macs. 

Streamlined user interface: You'll quickly build professional, complex documents using Word 2008 Document Elements. With a visual gallery of document components in the new user interface, cover pages, tables of contents, and citations are just a click away. 

Your Mac, more compatible: Office 2008 Special Media Edition and Windows-based 2007 Office products share the Open XML file formats, the OfficeArt graphics engine and other compatibility tools. You'll be confident when sharing ideas and documents with colleagues across platforms. 

Media-rich documents in minutes: Great design is a click away with hundreds of new templates, SmartArt graphics, Publishing Layout View, and professional quality clip art and photos. 

Your media, well managed: Drag-and-drop digital asset management, batch conversion and tagging, even built-in archiving and backup capabilities help you manage over 100,000 files and hundreds of format types across multiple storage devices. Expression Media gives you more power to work and manage your digital assets. 

Which Version of Office 2008 is right for you? View this comparison chart. 

Simplify Your Work
Your presentation will make an impact. Your documents will be professional. Your analysis will be insightful. And Office 2008 will be there.
The latest version of the industry standard for productivity software on the Macintosh platform, Microsoft Office 2008 for Mac is more powerful and easier to use. Office 2008 combines Microsoft Word for Mac, Microsoft PowerPoint for Mac, Microsoft Excel for Mac, Microsoft Entourage for Mac, and Microsoft Messenger for Mac and lets you easily create high-impact documents and seamlessly share your ideas with others, whether they are on the Mac or Windows platform. 

What's New in Office for Mac?


 * Universal versions of the most popular productivity applications on the Macintosh platform (Universal applications run natively on Intel- and PowerPC-based Macs.) 
 * Microsoft Office for Mac natively supports the Open XML file formats for compatibility with Windows-based 2007 Microsoft Office products. 
 * A redesigned user interface and powerful new tools for simplifying work, creating great looking documents, and exchanging ideas and information with others. 

Highlights of Office 2008 for Mac


 * Office 2008 is a Universal Binary, was built by Mac users for Mac users, and includes many features which take advantage of underlying technologies of the Macintosh platform. 
 * Office 2008 uses Open XML file formats for compatibility with Windows-based 2007 Microsoft Office products. XML file formats help reduce the risk of lost information due to damaged or corrupted files and also result in smaller file sizes--up to 75 percent smaller than comparable binary documents. Office 2008 for Mac is backward-compatible with earlier file formats and users can continue to use the older .doc, .xls, and .ppt binary formats. 
 * Elements Gallery is the foundation of the new user interface, and gives easy access to the most commonly used tools and templates. With the new UI, you'll harness the capabilities of Office for Mac more easily than ever before. 
 * Office 2008 includes OfficeArt, the powerful graphics engine also used in the Windows-based Office 2007 products. You get great cross-platform file fidelity and easy access to stunning visual and graphic effects. 
 * Your words will make an impact with the modern styling of SmartArt graphics, which makes transforming text and bulleted lists into professional diagrams and graphics one-click easy. 
 * A new Themes capability simplifies the process of applying a consistent look and feel across documents. Easily apply a complete set of colors, fonts, and effects to your Office 2008 documents, and change them as easily as changing your mind. 
 * Automator Actions for Workflows in Microsoft Office enables you to automate Office 2008 with more than 70 pre-defined actions built to simplify your work and extend your productivity. (Available in Office 2008 for Mac and Office 2008 for Mac Special Media Edition.) 

Entourage 2008, the hub of Office 2008, helps it to happen, one task at a time. 

Enjoy powerful new tools, over 100 designer templates, rich themes, and an intuitive user interface in Word 2008. 

Entourage 2008
Your e-mails will spark ideas, you'll schedule meetings where creativity abounds. Entourage 2008, the hub of Office 2008, helps it to happen, one task at a time. 

 * My Day keeps you connected to the action. Schedules, tasks, and priorities in one easy, standalone interface. Time will have no choice but to be well-managed. 
 * Use color-coded categories, status indicators, and flexible To-Do list management humble even the most hectic schedules. 
 * Office 2008 for Mac and Office 2008 Special Media Edition enable users to access their Microsoft Exchange server accounts with Entourage. 
 * Improved Junk E-Mail filtering capabilities and phishing protection tools help shield your inbox from the scourge of junk. Your inbox will breathe a sigh of relief. 
 * Projects submit to your superior management skills when you unleash the power of Project Center, With project details like e-mail messages, documents, schedules, and contacts in one convenient place, Project Center helps keep your information--and your stress--under control. 

Word 2008
Powerful new tools, over 100 designer templates, rich themes, and an intuitive user interface in Word 2008 will help you to make your ideas look as good as they are. 

 * When you turn blah into brilliant, Publishing Layout View will elevate the way you think about Word 2008. This new specialized and customizable workspace lets users create incredibly rich documents such as newletters, flyers and brochures without a degree in design. 
 * Great looking document construction won't require a hard hat. New Templates, Themes, and Document Elements like cover pages and bibliographies make creating professional-looking output a snap. 
 * Your words will make an impact with the modern styling of SmartArt, which makes transforming text into high-quality graphics and diagrams as easy as one click. 
 * Dynamic Guides will help you keep all of your words and graphics in line and on point. 
 * Mass mailings will have a personal touch and Word 2008 Mail Merge Manager will guide you step by easy step. 

Inspire your audience's imagination with compelling visuals and engaging layout in PowerPoint 2008. 

Analyze, share, and manage your data, and easily create persuasive charts and thought-provoking graphs for powerful results with Excel 2008. 

PowerPoint 2008
Your presentation is a story. PowerPoint 2008 will illustrate it. Inspire your audience's imagination with compelling visuals and engaging layout. 

 * Great ideas will get their graphic due with SmartArt graphics in PowerPoint 2008. Start with a blank slide or a bulleted list, and, with a click of a button, you'll have a stunning chart, table, map, or diagram. 
 * Designer Themes help you give your presentation a creative look, simply and quickly. 
 * The new Object Palette allows quick access to all your shapes, art, symbols, and pictures--including iPhoto files--in one easy-to-access space. 
 * Dynamic Guides will help you place and resize your graphic element to create professional-looking presentations in a snap. 
 * You'll lay out custom designs to showcase your unique content with custom layout capabilities in PowerPoint 2008. 
 * PowerPoint 2008 integration with Apple Remote Control lets you concentrate on your words, not your keyboard. Now control your presentation and engage your audience unleashed from the podium. Excel 2008
   It's a numbers game. With Excel 2008, analyze, share, and manage your data, and easily create persuasive charts and thought-provoking graphs for powerful results. 
   
    * Ledger Sheets in Excel 2008 make tracking finances, inventories, even invoices and portfolios easy with preformulated spreadsheets and automatic calculations. 
    * Charting improvements artfully convey the message your data is telling. You'll see your numbers in a whole new way. 
    * The new prebuilt functions tackle the most common tasks and make creating error-free complex conditional formulas easier. 
    * Quick access to formulas makes functions more functional with Formula Builder in Excel 2008. 
    * Your data will know virtually no limits. Excel 2008 now supports over 16,000 columns and over 1 million rows. 
    * Whether you're an Excel expert or a complete novice, Excel 2008 Formula AutoComplete simplifies your calculations by providing a dynamic pop-up menu so you can select and complete your formula. 
   
   Messenger for Mac
   Convenience is the name of the game for Mac users who want to communicate instantly with family, friends and colleagues from one convenient place. Messenger for Mac is now a Universal application, and gives you more ways to share what's on your mind or on your plate. 
   
   Use Messenger for Mac to instantly check the status of project team members, streamline workflow by sending documents directly from Word, or offer questions or comments on document changes instantly. 
   
    * Yahoo! Interoperability will allow personal users to connect and message with Yahoo! Messenger for Mac users. 
    * Your intentions will never again be in doubt when you create your own custom emoticons in Messenger for Mac. 
    * Spelling Checker is now included in Messenger for Mac. 
    * Let the world know your tastes when you display your iTunes selection with the new "What I'm listening to now" feature.
feature_bullets: Streamlined user interface runs natively on both Intel- and PowerPC-based Macs
Open XML file formats, the Office Art graphics engine, and other features that result in compatibility and file fidelity
Drag-and-drop digital asset management, batch conversion and tagging, and built-in archiving
Automator Actions for Workflows in Microsoft Office enables you to automate Office 2008 with more than 70 pre-defined actions..
Includes: Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Entourage, Microsoft Server Exchange Support, Automator Actions for Workflows in Microsoft Office
